example.name: beam-secondary
example.description: Demonstration of how to break secondary beams. The first subexample shows a beam without breaks. The second subexample shows a break for every three notes. The third subexample shows a break for every two notes.

file.name: secondary.ai
file.description: Adobe Illustrator CS3 file containing example. Equivalent to PDF file.

file.name: secondary.mus
file.description: SCORE file used to create example

file.name: description.txt
file.description: this file in plain text format
